job.name: TpcRSClu
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes # setup gcc # setup 32b # starver SL15j starver .DEV2 # echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' # if (! $?) then # set rung = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` # set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` # set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # else # exit 1; # endif set f = 1; set l = 10; switch ($PWD) case '*2013*': set year = "y2013_1x,beamline,sdt20130317.070000,Corr4,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D"; breaksw case '*2014*': set year = "y2014a,beamline,sdt20140330"; breaksw case '*2015*': set year = "y2015"; breaksw default: exit 1; endsw set base = `basename ${INPUTFILE0} .fz`_${f}_${l}; set file = ${base}.root set logFile = ${base}.log if ( -r ${logFile}) exit 0; root4star -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"fzin,'${year}',tpcRS,TpxClu,useXgeom,MakeEvent,McEvent,bbcSim,btofsim,mtdSim,emcY2,EEfs,evout,geantout,verybig,analysis,noRunco,noHistos","'${INPUTFILE0}'","'${file}'")' >& ${logFile}
